title: (x) "Chad Garrington, kitchen manager" scripts - Balloon, Present Script {David H}
content:
I don’t know why I try to think I can compete with the experts.

Anybody got any ideas what these 2 fonts might be?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011856im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/2fonts_4395.jpg)

What bothers me is I went to say I know that the top font is but I just cant remember or find it. Very frustrating.

 [‹ Lucille Ball & Bob Hope 1962 movie lettering](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011856/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31824 "Go to previous forum topic") [Looking for a soft sans similar to Halvorsen ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709011856/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31779 "Go to next forum topic")
author: retoid
